## MaxValueNumberValidatorDirective class

Directive injecting checking for number max value validator

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MaxValueNumberValidatorDirective implements Validator, OnChanges 
```
<b>Implements:</b> Validator, OnChanges
